verses.verse: וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> came בְּעַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <WH6249> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> year בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> in the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> [that] the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man יַ֠עַן <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after אָ֨מְרָה <WH559> hath said צֹּ֤ר <WH6865> because that Tyrus עַל־ <WH5921> concerning יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> against Jerusalem הֶאָ֔ח <WH1889> Aha נִשְׁבְּרָ֛ה <WH7665> she is broken דַּלְת֥וֹת <WH1817> [that was] the gates הָעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> of the people נָסֵ֣בָּה <WH5437> she is turned אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me אִמָּלְאָ֖ה <WH4390> unto me I shall be replenished הָחֳרָֽבָה׃ <WH2717> [now] she is laid waste

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> I am against צֹ֑ר <WH6865> Behold I [am] against thee O Tyrus וְהַעֲלֵיתִ֤י <WH5927> to come up עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> against גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> and will cause many כְּהַעֲל֥וֹת <WH5927> to come up הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> against thee as the sea לְגַלָּֽיו׃ <WH1530> causeth his waves

וְשִׁחֲת֞וּ <WH7843> And they shall destroy חֹמ֣וֹת <WH2346> the walls צֹ֗ר <WH6865> of Tyrus וְהָֽרְסוּ֙ <WH2040> and break down מִגְדָּלֶ֔יהָ <WH4026> her towers וְסִֽחֵיתִ֥י <WH5500> I will also scrape עֲפָרָ֖הּ <WH6083> her dust מִמֶּ֑נָּה <WH4480> from וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> from her and make אוֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> לִצְחִ֥יחַ <WH6706> her like the top סָֽלַע׃ <WH5553> of a rock

מִשְׁטַ֨ח <WH4894> It shall be [a place for] the spreading חֲרָמִ֤ים <WH2764> of nets תִּֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> will become בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> of the sea כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> for I have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> will become לְבַ֖ז <WH957> and it shall become a spoil לַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> to the nations

וּבְנוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH1323> And her daughters אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> which [are] in the field בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> by the sword תֵּהָרַ֑גְנָה <WH2026> shall be slain וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> and they shall know כִּי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD פ

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֧י <WH2005> behold מֵבִ֣יא <WH935> Behold I will bring אֶל־ <WH413> upon צֹ֗ר <WH6865> upon Tyrus נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֧ר <WH5019> Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֛ל <WH894> of Babylon מִצָּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> from the north מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> a king מְלָכִ֑ים <WH4428> of kings בְּס֛וּס <WH5483> with horses וּבְרֶ֥כֶב <WH7393> and with chariots וּבְפָרָשִׁ֖ים <WH6571> and with horsemen וְקָהָ֥ל <WH6951> and companies וְעַם־ <WH5971> people רָֽב׃ <WH7227> and much

בְּנוֹתַ֥יִךְ <WH1323> thy daughters בַּשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> in the field בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> with the sword יַהֲרֹ֑ג <WH2026> He shall slay וְנָתַ֨ן <WH5414> and he shall make עָלַ֜יִךְ <WH5921> against דָּיֵ֗ק <WH1785> a fort וְשָׁפַ֤ךְ <WH8210> against thee and cast עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> against סֹֽלְלָ֔ה <WH5550> a mount וְהֵקִ֥ים <WH6965> against thee and lift up עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> against צִנָּֽה׃ <WH6793> the buckler

וּמְחִ֣י <WH4239> engines קָֽבָלּ֔וֹ <WH6904> of war יִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> And he shall set בְּחֹֽמוֹתָ֑יִךְ <WH2346> against thy walls וּמִ֨גְדְּלֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH4026> thy towers יִתֹּ֖ץ <WH5422> he shall break down בְּחַרְבוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH2719> and with his axes

מִשִּׁפְעַ֥ת <WH8229> By reason of the abundance סוּסָ֖יו <WH5483> of his horses יְכַסֵּ֣ךְ <WH3680> shall cover אֲבָקָ֑ם <WH80> their dust מִקּוֹל֩ <WH6963> at the noise פָּרַ֨שׁ <WH6571> of the horsemen וְגַלְגַּ֜ל <WH1534> and of the wheels וָרֶ֗כֶב <WH7393> and of the chariots תִּרְעַ֙שְׁנָה֙ <WH7493> shall shake חֽוֹמוֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH2346> thee thy walls בְּבֹאוֹ֙ <WH935> when he shall enter בִּשְׁעָרַ֔יִךְ <WH8179> into thy gates כִּמְבוֹאֵ֖י <WH3996> as men enter עִ֥יר <WH5892> into a city מְבֻקָּעָֽה׃ <WH1234> wherein is made a breach

בְּפַרְס֣וֹת <WH6541> With the hoofs סוּסָ֔יו <WH5483> of his horses יִרְמֹ֖ס <WH7429> shall he tread down אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֽוּצוֹתָ֑יִךְ <WH2351> all thy streets עַמֵּךְ֙ <WH5971> thy people בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> by the sword יַהֲרֹ֔ג <WH2026> he shall slay וּמַצְּב֥וֹת <WH4676> garrisons עֻזֵּ֖ךְ <WH5797> and thy strong לָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> to the ground תֵּרֵֽד׃ <WH3381> shall go down

וְשָׁלְל֣וּ <WH7997> And they shall make a spoil חֵילֵ֗ךְ <WH2428> of thy riches וּבָֽזְזוּ֙ <WH962> and make a prey רְכֻלָּתֵ֔ךְ <WH7404> of thy merchandise וְהָֽרְסוּ֙ <WH2040> and they shall break down חוֹמוֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH2346> thy walls וּבָתֵּ֥י <WH1004> houses חֶמְדָּתֵ֖ךְ <WH2532> thy pleasant יִתֹּ֑צוּ <WH5422> and destroy וַאֲבָנַ֤יִךְ <WH68> thy stones וְעֵצַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH6086> and thy timber וַֽעֲפָרֵ֔ךְ <WH6083> and thy dust בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst מַ֖יִם <WH4325> of the water יָשִֽׂימוּ׃ <WH7760> and they shall lay

וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֖י <WH7673> to cease הֲמ֣וֹן <WH1995> And I will cause the noise שִׁירָ֑יִךְ <WH7892> of thy songs וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> and the sound כִּנּוֹרַ֔יִךְ <WH3658> of thy harps לֹ֥א <WH3808> no יִשָּׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> shall be no more heard עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> more

וּנְתַתִּ֞יךְ <WH5414> And I will make לִצְחִ֣יחַ <WH6706> thee like the top סֶ֗לַע <WH5553> of a rock מִשְׁטַ֤ח <WH4894> upon חֲרָמִים֙ <WH2764> nets תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> become לֹ֥א <WH3808> no תִבָּנֶ֖ה <WH1129> thou shalt be built ע֑וֹד <WH5750> more כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> GOD דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> no more for I the LORD ס

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3069> GOD לְצ֑וֹר <WH6865> to Tyrus הֲלֹ֣א ׀ <WH3808> at מִקּ֣וֹל <WH6963> at the sound מַפַּלְתֵּ֗ךְ <WH4658> of thy fall בֶּאֱנֹ֨ק <WH602> cry חָלָ֜ל <WH2491> when the wounded בֵּהָ֤רֵֽג <WH2026> is made הֶ֙רֶג֙ <WH2027> when the slaughter בְּתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <WH8432> in the midst יִרְעֲשׁ֖וּ <WH7493> shake הָאִיִּֽים׃ <WH339> Shall not the isles

וְֽיָרְד֞וּ <WH3381> shall come down מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from כִּסְאוֹתָ֗ם <WH3678> from their thrones כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> all נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <WH5387> Then all the princes הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> of the sea וְהֵסִ֙ירוּ֙ <WH5493> and lay away אֶת־ <WH853> מְעִ֣ילֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4598> their robes וְאֶת־ <WH853> בִּגְדֵ֥י <WH899> garments רִקְמָתָ֖ם <WH7553> their broidered יִפְשֹׁ֑טוּ <WH6584> and put off חֲרָד֤וֹת ׀ <WH2731> themselves with trembling יִלְבָּ֙שׁוּ֙ <WH3847> they shall clothe עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> upon the ground יֵשֵׁ֔בוּ <WH3427> they shall sit וְחָֽרְדוּ֙ <WH2729> and shall tremble לִרְגָעִ֔ים <WH7281> at [every] moment וְשָׁמְמ֖וּ <WH8074> and be astonished עָלָֽיִךְ׃ <WH5921> and

וְנָשְׂא֨וּ <WH5375> And they shall take up עָלַ֤יִךְ <WH5921> over קִינָה֙ <WH7015> a lamentation וְאָ֣מְרוּ <WH559> for thee and say לָ֔ךְ אֵ֣יךְ <WH349> How אָבַ֔דְתְּ <WH6> to thee How art thou destroyed נוֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> [that wast] inhabited מִיַּמִּ֑ים <WH3220> of seafaring men הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> city הַהֻלָּ֗לָה <WH1984> the renowned אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> Which הָיְתָ֨ה <WH1961> become חֲזָקָ֤ה <WH2389> which wast strong בַיָּם֙ <WH3220> in the sea הִ֣יא <WH1931> and her וְיֹשְׁבֶ֔יהָ <WH3427> she and her inhabitants אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Who נָתְנ֥וּ <WH5414> which cause חִתִּיתָ֖ם <WH2851> their terror לְכָל־ <WH3605> all יוֹשְׁבֶֽיהָ׃ <WH3427> [to be] on all that haunt

עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now יֶחְרְד֣וּ <WH2729> tremble הָֽאִיִּ֔ן <WH339> Now shall the isles י֖וֹם <WH3117> in the day מַפַּלְתֵּ֑ךְ <WH4658> of thy fall וְנִבְהֲל֛וּ <WH926> shall be troubled הָאִיִּ֥ים <WH339> yea the isles אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בַּיָּ֖ם <WH3220> that [are] in the sea מִצֵּאתֵֽךְ׃ <WH3318> at thy departure ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD בְּתִתִּ֤י <WH5414> When I shall make אֹתָךְ֙ <WH853> עִ֣יר <WH5892> city נֶחֱרֶ֔בֶת <WH2717> thee a desolate כֶּעָרִ֖ים <WH5892> like the cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> are not נוֹשָׁ֑בוּ <WH3427> that are not inhabited בְּהַעֲל֤וֹת <WH5927> when I shall bring up עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> over אֶת־ <WH853> תְּה֔וֹם <WH8415> the deep וְכִסּ֖וּךְ <WH3680> shall cover הַמַּ֥יִם <WH4325> waters הָרַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> upon thee and great

וְהוֹרַדְתִּיךְ֩ <WH3381> When I shall bring thee down אֶת־ <WH854> for י֨וֹרְדֵי <WH3381> with them that descend ב֜וֹר <WH953> into the pit אֶל־ <WH413> to עַ֣ם <WH5971> with the people עוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> of old time וְ֠הוֹשַׁבְתִּיךְ <WH3427> and shall set בְּאֶ֨רֶץ <WH776> of the earth תַּחְתִּיּ֜וֹת <WH8482> thee in the low parts כָּחֳרָב֤וֹת <WH2723> in places desolate מֵֽעוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> of old אֶת־ <WH854> for י֣וֹרְדֵי <WH3381> with them that go down ב֔וֹר <WH953> to the pit לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> so לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תֵשֵׁ֑בִי <WH3427> that thou be not inhabited וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> and I shall set צְבִ֖י <WH6643> glory בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land חַיִּֽים׃ <WH2416> of the living

בַּלָּה֥וֹת <WH1091> thee a terror אֶתְּנֵ֖ךְ <WH5414> I will make וְאֵינֵ֑ךְ <WH369> will be no וּֽתְבֻקְשִׁ֗י <WH1245> and thou [shalt be] no [more] though thou be sought for וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תִמָּצְאִ֥י <WH4672> be found עוֹד֙ <WH5750> again לְעוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> yet shalt thou never נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> again saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD ס
